docs.lead_paragraph: The birthrate dropped for the second year in a row since the recession began in 2007, as many people apparently decided they could not afford more mouths to feed.

headline.seo: Birthrate in U.S. at Lowest Level in at Least a Century
headline.main: Birthrate Is Lowest in a Century
headline.print_headline: Birthrate Is Lowest In a Century

docs.lead_paragraph: When Linda Falcao applied for a mortgage from Wells Fargo, she didn't realize she would be required to write the type of essay that's more commonly included with a college application. So she and her husband, Kemuel Ronis, were taken by surprise when Wells Fargo asked the couple, both 50, to pen a ''motivational letter'' explaining why they were moving. What they found even more shocking, however, were some of the themes that Wells required them to include in their statement, specifically, their plans regarding an ''increase/decrease in family'' or property size.
docs.abstract: Bucks blog notes case where Wells Fargo asked mortgage applicant for 'motivational letter' as to why person was moving; suggests request borders on violating Fair Housing Act (M)
docs.snippet: When Linda Falcao applied for a mortgage from Wells Fargo, she didn't realize she would be required to write the type of essay that's more commonly included with a college application.     So she and her husband, Kemuel Ronis, were taken by surprise...

docs.lead_paragraph: There are topics I do not have permission to write about on my blog. My children's social lives are one of those.
docs.abstract: What is the right age to start dating? What are the rules?
docs.snippet: What is the right age to start dating? What are the rules?

docs.lead_paragraph: You may remember one of my posts from last year in which I talked about not needing a public relations firm because we were getting plenty of media coverage organically. Well, as I looked back on that coverage recently, I realized that it was more focused on me as a business owner than on the company and the team. And right now, I'm so busy building the company, training new employees, and managing my pregnancy that I haven't had time to seek speaking and interview opportunities.

headline.main: I've Changed My Mind About P.R.

docs.abstract: We're going to start with a three-month trial period. I'm nervous about shelling out money without a guarantee of performance.
docs.snippet: We're going to start with a three-month trial period. I'm nervous about shelling out money without a guarantee of performance.

docs.lead_paragraph: Nadja Benaissa, a German pop star, was found guilty on Thursday of causing grievous bodily harm to a man who contracted H.I.V. after having unprotected sex with her, as my colleague Michael Slackman reports.

headline.main: German Star Convicted of Spreading H.I.V.

docs.abstract: Nadja Benaissa, a German pop star, was found guilty on Thursday of causing grievous bodily harm to a man who contracted H.I.V. after having unprotected sex with her, but will not have to go to jail.
docs.snippet: Nadja Benaissa, a German pop star, was found guilty on Thursday of causing grievous bodily harm to a man who contracted H.I.V. after having unprotected sex with her, but will not have to go to jail.

docs.lead_paragraph: NA CHUEAK, THAILAND -- Three months ago, images of protesters battling the military in the streets of Bangkok seized the world's attention. Now, by some measures, Thailand is bouncing back: the country's economy is projected to grow as fast as 7.5 percent this year, and the government is pushing ahead with a program of ''reconciliation'' with its opponents. But even as Thailand pulls itself back together, there are concerns that deep-seated problems among its young people represent a quieter, long-term threat to the country's future.

headline.main: Deeply Troubled Youth Threaten to Scuttle Thai Recovery

docs.abstract: Thailand is pulling itself back together after Bangkok riots but there are concerns that problems among its young people represent quieter, long-term threat to country's future; growing violence and drug and alcohol use among young stir fears that Thailand's dream of joining ranks of world's most developed countries may be elusive; photos; map (M)
